title: Drawing, Art Deco Style Design for Fabric Shop Storefront, ca. 1925
title_raw: Art Deco Style Design for Fabric Shop Storefront
medium: Graphite, brush and gray wash, green watercolor, white gouache, pen and gold ink on gray paperboard
markings: At lower right, small [1/2 x 1 in.] Kilemnik stamp in black (top):  KILEMNIK & Cia/524 FLORIDA;  small [1/2 x 1 in.]; copyright stamp in black (below): LEY  7092/9510/DE PROTECCION/ A LA/PROPIEDAD/ARTISTICA
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower right: C
description: A view of a row of storefront vitrines, alternating in shorter and taller heights.  All glass panels are enframed by a gold band. The short windows have wrought iron panels on each side.  The tall windows have a green marble (?) dados; shorter windows have thinner green marble dados.  All the windows display draped fabrics.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Art Deco Style Design for Fabric Shop Storefront, ca. 1925. Graphite, brush and gray wash, green watercolor, white gouache, pen and gold ink on gray paperboard. 
Gift of Maureen Cogan. 1999-39-11.
